title: Favor Over Fear
description: In a year that has been overrun with fear, what if we focused on God’s favor instead? Pastor Steven Furtick shares in “Favor Over Fear” that you get to choose how you define this year. Are you only going to focus on the disappointments or can you recognize how God’s favor has been with you through it all?
dc:creator: Elevation Church
